questions.question: What is your name?
questions.answer: I am a friendly bot designed to assist you.

questions.question: What can you do?
questions.answer: I can provide information, answer questions, and assist with various tasks.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: You can contact support by emailing support@example.com or calling our helpline at 123-456-7890.

questions.question: Tell me a joke.
questions.answer: Why did the computer go to therapy? It had too many bytes of emotional baggage!

questions.question: What is the meaning of life?
questions.answer: The meaning of life is subjective and varies from person to person. Some find meaning in relationships, others in personal achievements.
